StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetSelec.onBoardVote]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body: ( @NWAID int, @BoardID int, @VoterID uniqueiden..er ) AS SELECT [VOTE_ID], [BOARD_ID], [NWA_ID], [VOTER_ID], [VOTE_ORDER], [VOTE] FROM [mcriss].[dbo].[SELECTION_BOARD_VOTE] WHERE NWA_ID = @NWAID AND BOARD_ID = @BoardID AND VOTER_ID = @VoterID AND VOTE_ORDER = (SELECT MAX(VOTE_ORDER) FROM [mcriss].[dbo].[SELECTION_BOARD_VOTE] WHERE NWA_ID = @NWAID AND BOARD_ID = @BoardID AND VOTER_ID = @VoterID)
